featured.text: And in 1994, Microsoft CEO (chief executive officer) Bill Gates paid $30.8 million for a handwritten notebook penned by Leonardo da Vinci.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於書寫或繪畫的工具，通常含有墨水或顏料。
definition.en_def: A tool used for writing or drawing, typically containing ink or pigment.
definition.example: She wrote her name with a blue pen.
